name: FlameReach
description:
An arcade style VR cooking game made for the "Great Autumn Game Jam: 2021"

I ended up joining the game jam about a week late, so I didn't get to add as many things as i wanted to, but it still turned out like a "mostly" finished game, so i'm happy with it.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

BASIC TUTORIAL!

- Move with the left stick and snap turn with the right

- The button next to the shelves spawns more items (it also resets the sticks)

- Put the ordered item on the plate and ring the bell to serve before the timer runs out!

- You can put items on the end of the stick by holding it in one hand and either placing an item on it, or stabbing the item with the stick (this is more fun imo)

- Cook Pumpkins on the stick to turn them into pies

- The keg on the left is Cider, and the one on the right is Cocoa, hold the cup under the tap to fill them

- Time Management is key!

------------------------------------------------------------------------

I didn't play it for too long while testing stuff, so my highscore was only 15, leave yours down in the comments!!!
